alert.note: Alert for Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 10:01PM CDT until April 03 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Grady County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 1001 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pocasset to near Chickasha to 3 miles west of Norge, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Blanchard, Alex, Amber, Norge, Middleberg, Tabler and Ninnekah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
